name: Gardener's Resolve
prereq: Vigilante Dedication; Member Of The Gray Gardeners
summary: The Gray Gardeners are known for having nerves of steel and an unbreakable resolve.
description:
The Gray Gardeners are known for having nerves of steel and an unbreakable resolve. When you would be overwhelmed by terror, you can draw upon this resolve to keep your composure and remain undaunted. You take mental damage equal to twice your level, and the saving throw is a success.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.

Vigilante: Using actions and abilities with the vigilante trait while in your social identity risks exposing you as a vigilante.
trigger: You roll a failure (but not a critical failure) on a Will save against a fear effect
